data.name: Rescue Bear Operation
data.detailed_description:
Rescue Bear Operation Kickstarter

Stay tuned for the Rescue Bear Kickstarter effort. While the game, game-play, & mechanics are largely completed; it is our hope that we can expand 1) awareness, 2) add a few features, & 3) expand to a few other platforms to reach a wider audience! *Note: As of Q4 2021 - we will be supporting iOS, & Android. Please follow us on Social Media to learn more.


About the Game

Want to save some animals, and their habitats!? Rescue Bear Operation is: an introductory, 1-level, all ages, child friendly, free to play, mini game designed to create awareness around saving animals, & their habitats! We are a thought leader in Environmental Sustainability issues. We'll be donating at least 30% of our net proceeds to charitable causes. Rescue Bear is intentionally kept simple and accessible. There are two objectives. One: save as many friendly critters as you can! Two: save as many trees by putting out the wild fires! By doing this you will accumulate points that can be used as in-game currency to purchase unique cosmetic items in game. (E.g. hats, shirts, etc) Or; if you want to help good causes in giving back to 'trusted' real world charities and organizations dedicated towards issues of climate change (e.g wildfires, flooding, etc) we also offer unique downloadable content (DLC) that can be purchased with real world currency as well. Together - we *will* make a difference! Most of all, please have fun playing the game! Thank you!

Want to save some animals, and their habitats!?

Rescue Bear Operation is: an introductory, 1-level, all ages, child friendly, free to play, mini game designed to create awareness around saving animals, & their habitats! We are a thought leader in Environmental Sustainability issues. We'll be donating at least 30% of our net proceeds to charitable causes.

Rescue Bear is intentionally kept simple and accessible. There are two objectives. One: save as many friendly critters as you can! Two: save as many trees by putting out the wild fires! By doing this you will accumulate points that can be used as in-game currency to purchase unique cosmetic items in game. (E.g. hats, shirts, etc) Or; if you want to help good causes in giving back to 'trusted' real world charities and organizations dedicated towards issues of climate change (e.g wildfires, flooding, etc) we also offer unique downloadable content (DLC) that can be purchased with real world currency as well.

Together - we *will* make a difference!

Most of all, please have fun playing the game!

Thank you!
data.short_description: Rescue Bear Operation is: a one-level, all ages, child friendly, free to play, mini game designed to create awareness about wildfires. We'll be donating at least 30% of our net proceeds to charitable causes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 or greater GPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or greater GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

Minimum:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
